ssGUI
namespace
ssGUI
ssGUI::​ssGUIManager
ssGUI::​ssGUIManager

This manages all the GUI Objects, system input, update and render order, etc...  There's should only be 1 instance of ssGUIManager.

You only need to add the MainWindow object and run it.

ssGUIManager manager = ssGUIManager();
manager.AddGUIObject(mainWindowObject);
manager.StartRunning();

You can subscribe to the update function (called every frame) by adding a listener using AddPostGUIUpdateEventListener

You can also get the current instance of ssGUIManager without having to get a reference of it.

ssGUIManager* currentInstance = ssGUIManager::GetInstance();
Functions
AddRootGUIObject (Obselete)
void AddRootGUIObject(
ssGUI::GUIObject* obj
)

This is only used internally, used the template version instead.  Only main window should be added, the reason why it is accepting ssGUI::GUIObject is for future compatibility.

AddRootGUIObject
template<typename T> T* AddRootGUIObject()

Adds a GUI Object (Has to be MainWindow for now) to this ssGUIManager, the lifetime is managed by ssGUIManager.

AddGUIObjectAsChild
template<typename T> T* AddGUIObjectAsChild(
ssGUI::GUIObject* parent
)

Adds a GUI Object as a child to a GUIObject under this ssGUIManager, the lifetime is managed by ssGUIManager.

RemoveGUIObject (Obselete)
void RemoveGUIObject(
ssGUI::GUIObject* obj
)

Removes the main window object added by AddRootGUIObject. ssGUI::Hierarchy::Delete should be used instead to remove any ssGUI::MainWindow.

GetGUIObjectCount
int GetGUIObjectCount()

Returns the number of main window added by AddRootGUIObject

StartRunning
void StartRunning()

Starts the ssGUIManager.  This will block the thread until all MainWindows are closed

GetBackendInputInterface
ssGUI::Backend::BackendSystemInputInterface* GetBackendInputInterface()

Gets the ssGUI::Backend::BackendSystemInputInterface used by ssGUIManager

GetInstance
static ssGUI::ssGUIManager* GetInstance()

Static method that allow accessing ssGUIManager from anywhere. If there's no instance found, nullptr is returned.

AddPreGUIUpdateEventListener
int AddPreGUIUpdateEventListener(
std::function<void()> event
)

Adds event callback that gets triggered before the update function is called for GUI objects.  Returns index that can be used to remove the event callback later.

RemovePreGUIUpdateEventListener
void RemovePreGUIUpdateEventListener(
int index
)

Removes event callback that gets triggered before the update function is called for GUI objects

AddPostGUIUpdateEventListener
int AddPostGUIUpdateEventListener(
std::function<void()> event
)

Adds event callback that gets triggered after the update function (before render function) is called for GUI objects.  Returns index that can be used to remove the event callback later.

AddOnCustomRenderEventListener
int AddOnCustomRenderEventListener(
std::function<void( std::list<ssGUI::GUIObject*>& ) > event
)

Adds event callback that is responsible of rendering all the GUI Objects instead of using the default rendering by ssGUIManager Returns index that can be used to remove the event callback later.

RemoveOnCustomRenderEventListener
void RemoveOnCustomRenderEventListener(
int index
)

Removes the event callback that is responsible of rendering all the GUI Objects instead of using the default rendering by ssGUIManager
